overview: This film revolves around three main characters, THEY ALL HAVE A COMMON DREAM-they all dream of going to London and have their respective careers and lifestyle sorted with a good source of income in their respective professions. But one incident changes their visions, priorities and focus of their fairy tale and turns them into human beings with substance and inculcates' a never say die attitude' in their soul, finally making them decisive and matured in life letting them know the worth of India as a nation. The genre of movie is humor with a message to the youth about the worth of India as a nation.
title: Zindagi Unlimited
